full_summary:
#### Government Tender Announcement

**Project Title:** EW038-231710B - HVAC Upgrade Fort Smith, NT
**Reference Number:** WS3839727738-Doc3882052547

**Procurement Details:**

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Solicitation Type** | Request for Proposal (RFP) |
| **Procurement Method** | Competitive - Open Bidding |
| **Trade Agreements** | Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA) |
| **Regions of Delivery** | Fort Smith, NT |

**Background:**
This tender announcement cancels and supersedes a previous bid solicitation (Doc3839862455) and applies to the upgrade of the Heating, Ventilation, and Air Conditioning (HVAC) Building Management System controls in the Fort Smith Government of Canada Building.

**Tender Details:**

| **Category** | **Description** |
| --- | --- |
| **Closing Date** | 2023-03-14 at 14:00 HAE |
| **Bid Submission** | All bid submissions must be submitted by the closing date. Late submissions will be declared non-responsive. |
| **Amendment Date** | 2023-03-09 |
| **Contact Information** | Please direct inquires to Eric Kwan, PSPC/SPAC, at eric.kwan@tpsgc-pwgsc.gc.ca. |

**Project Scope:**
The successful bidder will be responsible for upgrading the HVAC Building Management System controls in the Fort Smith Government of Canada Building.

**Important Notes:**
A debriefing or feedback session will be provided upon request to bidders who submitted an offer in the previous solicitation.

**Government Agencies Involved:**

* Department of Public Works and Government Services (PSPC)

**URL of Tender Notice:** [http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15486323?extsite=MTU0ODYzMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==](http://discovery.ariba.com/rfx/15486323?extsite=MTU0ODYzMjNfQU4wMTQ4NDA1MDk5Mg==)

Let me know if there's anything I can do for you. You have my full attention! 1/ Hovering between coding, writing and project management, I find my true purpose in project development, coordination and delivery supporting teams in development both manually or agile methodology
